channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tangled and Troubling Legacy Pushes Romanians Further to the Right
item.description: An ultranationalist politician’s surge shows how many people there would rather forget the country’s fascist past during World War II, experts say.

item.title: General Mills’s top designer refreshed the Pillsbury Doughboy and risked defying its No. 1 rule: ‘Don’t break the billion dollar brand’
item.description: If you think Poppin' Fresh looks different, you'd be right. Teman Evans explains why his team refreshed the mascot, now firmly a "boomer."

item.title: Billionaires with a problem turn to this Florida attorney
item.description: Family offices help billionaire clients with everything from finding new investment opportunities to housing their art collections.
